column2: On the 2nd of May Mebee celebrated its 1500th anniversary with a evening to remember. Includes a student band performance and a meet-in-greet with local enviromentalist Morgoth Bauglir!
column4: This year our school fundraised over $15 520 001 to help support our Leaders in Yachts program. Expect even bigger things next year!
column6: Congratulations to the resilient class 431 on their recent surprise hiking trip up Mt Cook. Make sure to rest up over the coming holiday break. We've got even more exciting adventures planned next term!
column8: Congrats to our Weka Soccer team who flew into first place in the Regional Soccer Tournament and bet the Eagles 7-5!

column2: Parent teacher interviews are coming up on the 7th of July so make sure to book yours before it's too late!
